result.eng: I'd like to keep this book if I may.
result.ga: ba mhaith liom an leabhar seo a choimeád más ceadmhach dom
result.orig: ba mhaith liom an leabhar seo a choimeád más ceadmhach dom
result.html: ba mhaith liom an leabhar seo a choimeád más ceadmhach domI'd like to keep this book if I may.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ liom an leaḃar seo a ċoimeád más ceadṁaċ domI'd like to keep this book if I may.

result.eng: What is the title of the book?

result.orig: cad is teideal don leabhar

result.eng: 200 copies of the book were sold.

result.html: díoladh 200 cóip den leabhar200 copies of the book were sold.

result.eng: You will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ga: is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana

result.eng: The abandonment of children is the worst horror in this book.
result.ga: is é tréigean na bpáistí an t-uafás is measa sa leabhar seo

result.eng: I picked a book in the library.

result.orig: scríobh sé leabhar
result.html: scríobh sé leabharHe wrote a book.

result.eng: Give me the book please.

result.eng: He arrived with a book under his arm.

result.eng: It took me half a year to write the book.

result.eng: He pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
